To determine the demand of each region, we assume that 40% of the regions will have a criticality, such as a focus of the illness, and will thus require more tests. (For example, during the COVID-19 pandemics, the Chinese province of Wuhan, northern Italian regions, the autonomous communities of La Rioja, Madrid and Castilla-La Mancha in Spain, or the states of Washington and New York in the U.S.A. were foci in their respective countries.)
